alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:57PM EST until February 27 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL RUSH COUNTY... At 157 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glenwood, or 11 miles west of Connersville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for central Indiana. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
